other_tests.findings: Focal segment of colon with multiple diverticula, wall thickening, surrounding inflammatory change, scattered free intraperitoneal air, and trace free fluid along the left pelvis.
Right PICC catheter with the tip in the right atrium; bilateral patchy opacities predominantly in lower lung zones consistent with pulmonary edema; no pneumothorax; heart size enlarged but stable.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Unchanged from the prior radiograph from outside hospital.
